TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ZOrderConstants extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供常量以与 Visual Basic 6.0 方法保持兼容。

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，Visual Basic`ZOrder`方法替换为和函数。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the Visual Basic `ZOrder` method is replaced by the and functions. 这些常数启用已从 Visual Basic 6.0 中继续运行而不进行其他修改升级的代码。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
